title: Mark my Words....
body:
The Xin rework is going to ruin him.

Not many people care about Xin... they still remember when he was a terror and never what to see that again.... I don't either. But when they said they are going to do "minor changes to allow more skill and counterplay" mainly focusing on his W.... There is no way it ends well. Countless times riot has taken a champion I loved and played very frequently and made them into something that ruins the reason I play them... Corki, Graves, Shen all examples of champions I used to love until they turn them into either a monster (graves) who doesn't even have the same role as he once did, or Corki/Shen where they mutate their identity so much they are not what they once were.... 

Granted, it is mainly Xin's W, the least interactive part of his kit... but I can't help think they are gonna turn it into some gimmicky BS that will either make him a monster or completely change him into something that no one likes....

/rant

I want Xin to get a rework, but I have a terrible feeling Riot is going to mess it up and leave him in the dumpster for countless seasons....

(also the idea of them completely reworking Swain terrifies me)
